data.message:
tHIS IS FREAKY.
1) say your name 10 times
2) say your moms name 5 times
3) say your crushes name 3 times
4) PASTE THIS TO FOUR OTHER COMMENTS. IF YOU DO THIS. YOUR CRUSH WILL KISS YOU ON THE NEAREST...................... FRIDAY. BUT IF YOU READ THIS AND Don't PASTE IT YOU WILL HAVE BAD. LUCK. SEND THIS TO FIVE COMMENTS IN 143 MINUTES. WHEN YOU'RE DONE PRESS F6. AND YOUR CRUSH'S NAME WILL APPEAR IN BIG LETTER
